ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Storm Shadow, Snake Eyes & Zartan continue their pursuit of Dawn. The Joes in Darklonia attack a Revanche facility and Roadblock, Spirit and Grosz lay down cover for the others to escape. Wendy is brought back to Springfield for another Brainwave Scanner treatment. Dawn invades the same facility hoping to repair her own mind; Heather offers to help Dawn get to the Brainwave Scanner in exchange for saving her parents.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 16:31:07. [CVDB593185] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:11. [Issue ID 1693677]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Royale,Juan Fernandez,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Cobra [Doctor Mindbender,Lady Jaye,Wade Collins,Storm Shadow,Grosz,Dawn Moreno,Flint,Fred 191,Wendy Torres,Granny Demon [Obake Obaasan],Snake Eyes [Sean Collins]],Zartan,Sneak Peek,Blue Ninjas,G.I. Joe [Roadblock,Techno-Vipers],Spirit,Heather Collins,Katya,Vipers
